boardnotfoundmsg: It may have been deleted by the owner.
confirmdelete: To confirm type 'Delete account' in the box
createboarddesc: Create a new board to start collaborating with your team
deleteaccountdesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete your account and remove your data
deleteboarddesc: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete this board and remove its data
feat1desc: Say goodbye to endless email chains and disjointed communication. Kolabr allows you to collaborate with your team members in real time.
feat2desc: Embrace simplicity with our user-friendly interface. Organize your tasks effortlessly by dragging and dropping them across customizable lanes.
feat3desc: Gain a clear overview of your project's workflow through Kolabr. Customize columns to match your unique process and watch as tasks move through each stage.
feat4desc: Dive deeper into task details by adding descriptions, deadlines, assigned team members and labels. No more searching through different platformsâ€”everything you need is just a click away.
footerdesc: Sign up now and experience the power of live collaboration with Kolabr. Boost your team's efficiency, streamline your projects, and achieve your goals with ease. Let's unlock the full potential of teamwork together!
herodesc: Unlock the power of seamless teamwork with our dynamic and intuitive Kanban board.
herotitle: Effortlessly coordinate tasks, teams and tools in a single place
name: Name
namedesc: This is your public display name
passshort: Password should be at least 8 characters long
removeboarddesc: This action will remove your access to this board. You can still access it if the owner shares it with you again
samepass: New password cannot be the same as the current one
shareboarddesc: Share this board with your team members by adding their emails below
